pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Sweave Driver to Process Files with R Code and RTF Text // An Sweave driver that allows the user to use Sweave to create documents having R code chunks and rich text format (RTF) documentation chunks. After Sweave()ing the file the output is an .RTF file that can be opened in word processors like Microsoft Word. This approach may be useful for people who collaborate primarily with Word users but would otherwise prefer to use Sweave with LaTeX.
